trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved" />, and <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved" /> e <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs> is the root event arguments class for all component management events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs> é a classe de argumentos de evento de raiz para todos os eventos de gerenciamento de componente.

trans-unit.source: This type of event occurs when you add or remove components using a designer.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo de evento ocorre quando você adicionar ou remove componentes usando um designer.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The component that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O componente que é a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The component associated with the event.
